caption.title: A comparison of potential habitats under the present climate and three climatic scenarios in the LGM.
caption.p: ( A) Potential habitats under the present climate; ( B) Potential habitats under the climatic scenario LGM-CCSM; ( C) Overlap areas of the LGM-CCSM and the present. ( D) Potential habitats under the climatic scenario LGM-MIROC; ( E) Overlap areas of the LGM-MIROC and the present. ( F) Potential habitats under the climatic scenario LGM-MPI. ( G) Overlap areas of the LGM-MPI and the present. Purple lines: national boundaries between China and India (at issue). Maps were generated using the software ArcGIS v. 10.2.
